QuestData.Title: Pieces of Us
QuestData.Description: When the fires broke out, I took only my daughter's hand before we fled. It was the right decision, of course, but I do long for some of the things we left behind.$B$BI am an artificer, a shaper of crystals and gems. Without my tools I am just another refugee.$B$BOur town records are kept in a memory crystal in the main hall. With it, I can carry forward the knowledge and legacy of Aruuna.$B$BAlso, my daughter is terrified - it would be a great comfort for her to hold her favorite doll again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Crystal-Shaper's Tools, Melani's Doll, and the Annals of Aruuna.
QuestData.CompletionText: These are more than mere objects. They are our livelihood, our past and future, our comfort.$B$BThey are pieces of us.
